```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(dplyr)
library(moderndive)
```


Response Variable: steak_prep

Predictor Variables: Region of US, Household Income, Gambling, Age

Interaction Effects Between: 
Age + Income
Gambling + Income
Region + Income
Region + Age


Question: Which factors most influence the type of steak that people in the US consume?


```{r}
Age + Income
```



```{r}
glm_incomegamble <- glm(steak_prep ~ gamble + hhold_income, data = steak_survey)

get_regression_table(lm_incomegamble)

```




```{r}
Region + Income
```


```{r}
lm_regage <- lm(steak_prep ~ region + age, data = steak_survey)
get_regression_table(lm_regage)
```
